description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Square' that represents a single cell in a Tic Tac Toe game. The component renders a button with accessibility features and styling that varies based on its props, indicating its value ('X', 'O', or null), whether it is part of a winning line, or if it is disabled.

methods.name: Square
methods.description: React functional component for rendering a Tic Tac Toe cell as a button, with props controlling its appearance and behavior.
